description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              •    Working directly with U.S clients/ Nightshift (Viet Nam time: 21:00pm - 5:00am)
              
              •    Perform a general evaluation of an application (financial documents, mortgage type, etc.)
              
              •    Gather all important data from client (assets, debts, income, etc.)
              
              •    Verify information and references by contacting the right sources
              
              •    Correct mistakes and investigate inconsistencies
              
              •    Submit completed loan files to lender
              
              •    Act as point of contact between loan officers, underwriters and clients
              
              •    Conduct a final review of the file before closing
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              •    Welcome fresh graduated students Foreign Trade University or with majors in Economics, Finance or Banking
              
              •    Preferably candidates with experience in Personal Loan in banking industry.
              
              •    Proficiency in English because working with mainly US customers and colleagues.
              
              •    Working hours is United States time.
              
              •    Good communication, reading and writing in English.
              
              •    Strong attention to details, logical and organizational skills.
              
              •    Ability to multi-task, prioritizes, and manages time effectively.
              
              •    Outstanding communication and customer service skills.
